title: Local Hour: Do You Dream Of Michael Bublé?
description:
George Benson, Michael Bublé, and some Ambien kick off the David Samson Local Hour. He covers last night's World Series no-hitter and what Mike had on his three screens instead. Then, David questions Adam Silver and analyzes Kyrie Irving's most recent statement full of platitudes and empty of an apology. Plus, Kanye West, Ime Udoka, Daniel Snyder, and Billy Corben's new documentary, "God Forbid."
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
